name: Game Of life Test
description:
The game of life that I made myself as a "fan" project, you can edit the grid and create few shapes and random grid. This is just a first test using the game of life I will do other project using it, I've learned a lot about lambda expression during  the making of this project and other things.

Controls :

Left click : place cells

Right Click(hold) : Scroll grid

Escape : Pause/ShapePanel : you can select the shape that you want to place with left click, create a random grid(30% chance to create a cell) and comeback on the menu

A : nextTurn

if you want to change time between turn in auto turn you must mark the number with a comma (ex : 0,2, its set to 0.1 when you start)
